case.title: LOOKING FOR LOVE - 22 (Brooklyn ny)
case.text: i'm Looking for love Im 22 years old, 5.0 single mother. I live in brooklyn ny i am a mma muay thai fighter. I have been doing it for 6 years. I use to live in NC and im trying to move back. I have a lot of love that im ready and willing to give. But to the right man. I'm looking to get married. I'm ready for a serious relationship and a man that wants the same. I've been hurt lied to chated on and stepped on. I have high standards. i want to know what it's like to be with a marine. you know try something new. Well if u want to know more about me feel free to contact me with a number photo and looking for the same thing. I will not respond to u without a photo...
